Cell - Class in GameEngine
The Cell class, a serializable object representation of each cell in the GUI grid.

changeGridColor(GridPane, Color) - Static method in class GUIEngine.GUIMain
Changes the color of the GridPane grid to the given Color
checkAlivePlayers(Player) - Method in class GUIEngine.turnGUI
This is a utility function that evaluates how many players are active in the _players ArrayList of the GameController of the GameEngine, apart from the passed player.
checkEndGame() - Static method in class GUIEngine.GUIMain
Checks for the end game condition It iterates over the player ArrayList and returns whether the number of players having their _isAlive attribute set to true is 1 or not.
checkResume() - Static method in class GameEngine.GameEngine
Checks if the "game.ser" file, which contains the GameState to be resumed, exists or not.
checkUndo() - Static method in class GameEngine.GameEngine
Checks if the "undo.ser" file, which contains the GameState of the previous move, exists or not.

convert_index(int) - Static method in class GameEngine.GameController
This method returns the 2-D indices of a given GUI component in the GridPane.
convertGridToGUI(GridPane, Grid) - Static method in class GUIEngine.GUIMain
A utility function, that, given a serializable Grid object, populates a GridPane from it.
